channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260209)
item.description:
What's New

fix: AX Direct fallback uses backspace instead of Shift+Left selection

The Shift+Left selection fallback is unreliable in Firefox content areas,

causing characters to be inserted without replacing (e.g., 'dịch' → 'diịch').

Replace with backspace-based fallback which is universally reliable.

  • CharacterInjector: fallback to backspace + text when AX API fails
  • CharacterInjector: backspace-only mode also uses backspace instead of selection
  • Add AXDirectFallbackTests for the new fallback behavior
  • Bump build number to 20260209

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
